name: A Duck And His Rock
description:
Daniel Quake, a normal duckling, and his pet rock Randel, were taking a stroll down the creek when they heard their mother crying for help, for she was kidnaped by a fox who was ready for dinner! It's now up to Danny and Randel to get their mother back from Frank Fox and his evil henchmen in this short beat-em-up game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

  • Traverse though 5 Levels and a boss level!
  • Watch out for the pups and robofoxes!
  • Incudes some original music and graphics!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Punch
  • Mouse - Throw Randel
